body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Larry Martinez and I'm a customer service agent at Speedy Cars, how can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Larry, my name is Samantha Hayes and I have a concern regarding my recent experience at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Samantha. Could you please provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code and including the country code if applicable?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is one eight zero zero five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Samantha. Can you also share with me your email address so we can follow up with you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is samantha.hayes@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Samantha. We value your feedback and will address your concerns. Is there anything else you would like to add before we conclude?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance, Larry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Samantha. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day.
